title: Development of Adaptive Learning Models for Personalized Instructional Design in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational social studies theories and intermediate-level analytical skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended online-offline environment with individualized device utilization

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways for social studies topics using individualized learning models
Learners can select content optimized for their knowledge level and learning style through adaptive learning systems
Learning plans can be revised and supplemented through real-time feedback based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
